players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Bob was found dead.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia slip through our fingers."
You: "I agree with Charlie, we need to be cautious and keep a close eye on each other. Let's make sure we all trust one another and work together as a team."
Charlie: "I'd like to propose that we all share our alibis for last night. This will help us build trust and ensure that we can all account for our whereabouts during the time of the murder."
Diana: "I believe it's important that we all share our alibis to build trust and ensure transparency in our community. Last night, I was at home studying for my upcoming exam."
